name: Davey
description:
DAVEY is a fun, addictive platform puzzle game in anime styled 3D with realistic jumps and movements using motion capture and voice acting. Davey is a boy, who, after being held prisoner in a facility due to his unique ability to turn invisible, escapes his cell and you must help him find his way out.

FEATURES

-The ability to turn invisible, jump further and scout out the area
-Anime styled cel shaded graphics with wonderful motion captured graphics
-Addictive and rewarding gameplay
